body:
Hi Bill,

View analysis is originally designed for outdoor views and not indoor. You can still remove the windows and get it to work. You can find examples if you search the forum but I would suggest you to use David's more recent development. It's more sophisticated than Ladybug's component ([http://www.grasshopper3d.com/photo/field-of-view-component?context=...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/photo/field-of-view-component?context=latest)).

Mostapha
